summary: The implementation successfully delivers all core requirements for the Lasereraa industrial laser cutting website. All five requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-5) are implemented with their acceptance criteria met. The website features a professional homepage with hero section, services section for metal/MDF/acrylic cutting, products section for corporate/customizable gifts, industrial design theme with metallic tones and sharp aesthetics, and a contact section with company information. The domain 'lasereraa.com' is prominently displayed in header, footer, and contact sections. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn) in Footer component
hallucinated_features.reason: Social media integration was not requested in the BuildRequest. The footer includes clickable social media icons linking to placeholder URLs.
User authentication was explicitly listed in non-goals. The implementation includes InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and useActor hook for ICP authentication.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: Attribution link with UTM parameters was not requested in the BuildRequest.
